top10_tweets_like:
#Folds
library(tidyverse)
seq(from=-10, to=10, by = 0.025) %>%
  expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=(x+pi*sin(y)), 
             y=(y+pi*sin(x)))) +
  geom_point(alpha=.08, shape=20, size=0) + 
  theme_void()
